title: RP in canada worth less?
body: so i live in canada and as an avid league player i would love to buy skins and such and help fund riot games but i cant afford to it seems as a 10 dollar card here is only worth 1020 where as the us its 1350 (1060 and 1380 after bous i believe) and i don't think its fair that i have to spend 20 dollars (most places near me only sell 10 50 or 100 dollar card) on a skin that would cost my american friends 10, as that ends up being twice the price and i dont find that to be fair, or worth it at that point. i get that my dollar is worth a bit less but 300 rp less? it forces players like me to spend twice as much or go way out of our way to buy stuff for the game

replies.body: We have to alter RP prices according to exchange rates in order to make sure all regions are getting the same amount of RP for the same value, regardless of how much they are spending. Since League is based out of the US, our prices are based on the USD, but rest assured that you're still getting the same value out of your currency.
